text:
@JoeBiden You can do better, #Biden

You are more equipped to see/smell a problem like hair and feel roaches in the water up n down your legs. 
You know what thats like and you will put #COVID19 in chains!

Deliver Hunter  like a fortune cookie for green energy kickbags n bring jobs back!
